list_item.paragraph: CURSOR 3D Cursor, Draw stroke at 3D cursor location.
VIEW View, Stick stroke to the view .
SURFACE Surface, Stick stroke to surfaces.
CURSOR 3D Cursor, Draw stroke at 3D cursor location.
VIEW View, Stick stroke to the view .
SURFACE Surface, Stick stroke to surfaces.
CURSOR 3D Cursor, Draw stroke at 3D cursor location.
VIEW View, Stick stroke to the view .
SURFACE Surface, Stick stroke to surfaces.

desc_content.paragraph: How annotation strokes are orientated in 3D space

list_item.paragraph: CURSOR 3D Cursor, Draw stroke at 3D cursor location.
VIEW View, Stick stroke to the view .
SURFACE Surface, Stick stroke to surfaces.

desc_content.paragraph: Thickness of annotation strokes
Mode of automatic keyframe insertion for Objects and Bones
Limit for removing duplicates and ‘Auto Merge’
Changing edges seam re-calculates UV unwrap
The edge flag to tag when selecting the shortest path
Set strength of face to specified value
Settings for Grease Pencil Interpolation tools
Settings for stroke sculpting tools and brushes

list_item.paragraph: POINT Point, Select only points.
STROKE Stroke, Select all stroke points.
ORIGIN Origin, Draw stroke at Object origin.
CURSOR 3D Cursor, Draw stroke at 3D cursor location.
SURFACE Surface, Stick stroke to surfaces.
STROKE Stroke, Stick stroke to other strokes.
NONE All points, No snap.
ENDS End points, Snap to first and last points and interpolate.
FIRST First point, Snap to first point.

desc_content.paragraph: Type of keyframes to create when inserting keyframes

list_item.paragraph: KEYFRAME Keyframe, Normal keyframe - e.g. for key poses.
BREAKDOWN Breakdown, A breakdown pose - e.g. for transitions between key poses.
MOVING_HOLD Moving Hold, A keyframe that is part of a moving hold.
EXTREME Extreme, An ‘extreme’ pose, or some other purpose as needed.
JITTER Jitter, A filler or baked keyframe for keying on ones, or some other purpose as needed.

desc_content.paragraph: Prevent marker editing
Restrict select to the current mode
Which mesh elements selection works on

field_body.paragraph: boolean array of 3 items, default (False, False, False)

desc_content.paragraph: Normal Vector used to copy, add or multiply

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Proportional Editing mode, allows transforms with distance fall-off

list_item.paragraph: DISABLED Disable, Proportional Editing disabled.
ENABLED Enable, Proportional Editing enabled.
PROJECTED Projected (2D), Proportional Editing using screen space locations.
CONNECTED Connected, Proportional Editing using connected geometry only.

desc_content.paragraph: Falloff type for proportional editing mode

list_item.paragraph: SMOOTH Smooth, Smooth falloff.
SPHERE Sphere, Spherical falloff.
ROOT Root, Root falloff.
INVERSE_SQUARE Inverse Square, Inverse Square falloff.
SHARP Sharp, Sharp falloff.
LINEAR Linear, Linear falloff.
CONSTANT Constant, Constant falloff.
RANDOM Random, Random falloff.

desc_content.paragraph: Display size for proportional editing circle
Display only faces with the currently displayed image assigned
Type of element to snap to

list_item.paragraph: INCREMENT Increment, Snap to increments of grid.
VERTEX Vertex, Snap to vertices.
EDGE Edge, Snap to edges.
FACE Face, Snap to faces.
VOLUME Volume, Snap to volume.

desc_content.paragraph: Type of element to snap to

list_item.paragraph: GRID Grid, Snap to grid.
NODE_X Node X, Snap to left/right node border.
NODE_Y Node Y, Snap to top/bottom node border.
NODE_XY Node X / Y, Snap to any node border.

desc_content.paragraph: Which part to snap onto the target

list_item.paragraph: CLOSEST Closest, Snap closest point onto target.
CENTER Center, Snap transormation center onto target.
MEDIAN Median, Snap median onto target.
ACTIVE Active, Snap active onto target.

desc_content.paragraph: Type of element to snap to

list_item.paragraph: INCREMENT Increment, Snap to increments of grid.
VERTEX Vertex, Snap to vertices.

desc_content.paragraph: Pivot center for rotation/scaling

list_item.paragraph: BOUNDING_BOX_CENTER Bounding Box Center, Pivot around bounding box center of selected object(s).
CURSOR 3D Cursor, Pivot around the 3D cursor.
INDIVIDUAL_ORIGINS Individual Origins, Pivot around each object’s own origin.
MEDIAN_POINT Median Point, Pivot around the median point of selected objects.
ACTIVE_ELEMENT Active Element, Pivot around active object.

desc_content.paragraph: Ensure all bone-deforming vertex groups add up to 1.0 while weight painting
When creating new frames, the strokes from the previous/active frame are included as the basis for the new one
When draw new strokes, the new stroke is drawn below of all strokes in the layer
Only use the first and last parts of the stroke for snapping
Show compact list of color instead of thumbnails
When creating new strokes, the weight data is added according to the current vertex group and weight, if no vertex group selected, weight is not added
For channels with cyclic extrapolation, keyframe insertion is automatically remapped inside the cycle time range, and keeps ends in sync
Automatic keyframe insertion for Objects and Bones
Automatic keyframe insertion using active Keying Set only
Automatically merge vertices moved to the same location
Paint across the weights of all selected bones, maintaining their relative influence
Proportional editing in action editor
Proportional editing mask mode
Proportional editing object mode
Proportional editing in FCurve editor
Add a new NLA Track + Strip for every loop/pass made over the animation to allow non-destructive tweaking
Snap during transform
Align rotation with the snapping target
Absolute grid alignment while translating (based on the pivot center)
Consider objects as whole when finding volume center
Project individual elements on the surface of other objects
Snap onto itself (Edit Mode Only)
Manipulate center points (object, pose and weight paint mode only)
Enable brush for UV sculpting
Keep UV and edit mode mesh selection in sync
Algorithm used for UV relaxation

list_item.paragraph: LAPLACIAN Laplacian, Use Laplacian method for relaxation.
HC HC, Use HC method for relaxation.

desc_content.paragraph: Brush operates on all islands
Disable editing of boundary edges
Select Tools for the UV sculpt brushes

list_item.paragraph: PINCH Pinch, Pinch UVs.
RELAX Relax, Relax UVs.
GRAB Grab, Grab UVs.

desc_content.paragraph: UV selection and display mode

list_item.paragraph: VERTEX Vertex, Vertex selection mode.
EDGE Edge, Edge selection mode.
FACE Face, Face selection mode.
ISLAND Island, Island selection mode.

desc_content.paragraph: Filter Vertex groups for Display

list_item.paragraph: ALL All, All Vertex Groups.
BONE_DEFORM Deform, Vertex Groups assigned to Deform Bones.
OTHER_DEFORM Other, Vertex Groups assigned to non Deform Bones.

desc_content.paragraph: Display unweighted vertices

list_item.paragraph: NONE None.
ACTIVE Active, Show vertices with no weights in the active group.
ALL All, Show vertices with no weights in any group.

desc_content.paragraph: Weight to assign in vertex groups

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
